column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Vlad - Thank you for visiting us again! I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen
column2: but I'm even more happy you had a positive experience with us. We work hard to improve every day and in every way. And while we still slip up occasionally
column3: we never lose sight of that goal. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you soon! Here's wishing you more happy workouts!
